about.title: About WearSearch
about.description: Your guide to the world of fashion online shopping. Find the best stores and products in one place.
about.mission: We strive to make online shopping simpler and more enjoyable by bringing the best fashion brands together in one place.
about.value1Desc: We only work with verified stores and brands
about.value2Desc: We use modern technology for better shopping experience
about.value3Desc: We ensure secure and reliable online transactions
about.value4Desc: We create a community of fashion and style enthusiasts

stores.description: Explore our curated collection of online fashion stores. Find the best shops for your style.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out via social media or email.
contacts.reachDescription: Choose your preferred way to connect with us. We respond to all messages within 24 hours.
contacts.addStoreDescription: Are you a fashion retailer? Partner with us to showcase your products to thousands of shoppers. We help you reach more customers and grow your business.
contacts.suggestionsDescription: Have an idea to make WearSearch better? We love hearing from our users! Share your suggestions, report bugs, or request new features.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.p1: This website is an information platform (aggregator) that provides users with access to product information and links to third-party online stores and services.
section1.p2: The website only collects and processes minimal technical data necessary to ensure functionality and security of the platform.

section2.title: Data We Collect
section2.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
section2.li1: Basic account data (email, username) â€” only if you register;
section2.li2: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device information;
section2.li3: Cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience;
section2.li4: Interaction data: pages visited, links clicked, search history within the platform.

section3.title: How We Use Your Data
section3.intro: We use collected data for the following purposes:

subsection1.title: Platform Functionality
subsection1.li2: Saving favorites, search preferences, and other settings.

subsection2.title: Improving User Experience
subsection2.li1: Analyzing site usage to improve interface and features;

section3.note: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.

section4.title: Links to Third-Party Sites
section4.intro: The website contains links to external online stores and services. When you follow these links:
section4.li1: You are redirected to third-party resources;
section4.li2: Their privacy policies and terms of use apply;
section4.li3: We are not responsible for their data processing practices;
section4.li4: We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of each store before making a purchase.

section5.title: Advertising and Analytics
section5.intro: We may use third-party services for advertising and analytics, including but not limited to:
section5.li2: Google Analytics or similar analytics services;
section5.li3: Pixel tags and cookies for ad personalization;
section5.li5: Heat maps and behavioral analytics tools.

section6.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
section6.p1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device for improved performance and personalization.
section6.p3: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may limit platform functionality.
section6.browserSettings: Learn more about cookie settings in your browser's documentation.

section7.title: Data Storage and Security
section7.p1: We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
section7.li2: Restricted access to databases and servers.

section8.title: Data Retention
section8.p1: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide services and comply with legal requirements.
section8.p2: If you delete your account, your personal data will be removed within 30 days.
section8.p3: Some technical data (e.g., logs) may be retained longer for security and legal reasons.

section9.title: Your Rights
section9.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section9.li1: Access and correction: You can view and update your account information;
section9.li2: Deletion: You can request account deletion at any time;
section9.li3: Opt-out: You can disable cookies or unsubscribe from notifications.
section9.p2: To exercise these rights, contact us through the contact page.

section10.title: Children's Privacy
section10.intro: Our website is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you believe we have accidentally collected data from a child:
section10.li3: Parents/guardians are responsible for monitoring children's online activities.
section10.note: If you are under 16, do not use this website without parental permission.

section11.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
section11.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time.
section11.p2: The current version is always available on this page.
section11.p3: Continued use of the website after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

section12.title: Contact Us
section12.p1: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the contact page.
